description:
Maou and company find that a young lady named Suzuno has moved in next door. She is quick to make friends and starts helping them out, which causes Emi to wonder what her motives are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Dämonenkönig bekommt finanzielle Hilfe von seinen Nachbarn
Maou, Kinjozukiai de Kakei o Tasukerareru
The Devil`s Budget Is Saved by Neighborliness
魔王, 近所付き合いで家計を助けられる
